availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Indiana. Worked as a cook in Louisville. Accused of petty larceny in 1860 for stealing two oars from a steamship. Convicted of attempted robbery in 1864 in the Jefferson Circuit Court.

Mother: Jane Cunningham
Siblings: Robert Cunningham, Thomas Cunningham

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 1, page 30.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 8, page 19.
